name: Not so super and not exactly meat boy
name_original: Not so super and not exactly meat boy
description:
English Description

This is a little plattform game i've made inspired by the well known Super Meat Boy. It has 4 little levels that you'll have to overcome using the wall jumping mechanic.

Credits

For the developments of this game i've used the music and sounds of the following:

  • PlatformerMusicPackLITE - VOiD1Gaming (www.void1gaming.com)
  • Sound effects Pack 2 - Swiss Arcade Game Entertainment
  • Sound Effect Starter Pack - simon13666
Español Descripción

Este es un pequeño juego plataformas que he realizado inspirado en el famoso Super Meat Boy. Tiene 4 niveles que tendrás que superar utilizando el salto en paredes.

Creditos

Para el desarrollo de este juego he utilizado la música y efectos de sonido de los siguientes:

  • PlatformerMusicPackLITE - VOiD1Gaming (www.void1gaming.com)
  • Sound effects Pack 2 - Swiss Arcade Game Entertainment
  • Sound Effect Starter Pack - simon13666
